duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate a variety of heavy equipment for construction and excavation purposes.
Perform routine inspections and preventive maintenance on assigned equipment.
Follow company safety procedures and report problems to the appropriate supervisor.
Possess knowledge of moisture condition, cut grade, and loading trucks.
Specialize in operating one or more of the following: Excavator, Dozer, Roller, Motor Grader.
Capable of multi-tasking in a fast-paced environment with attention to detail.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED preferred
